ValidationRule.description: Prevent users apart from Sys Admins and Data Loaders, to change the products on assets which are not of covered part record type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT (ISNEW()), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $RecordType.Name <> "Covered Part", ISCHANGED(Product2Id) )
